com.foreach.across.core

Class AcrossModuleUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.AcrossModuleUtils

  • public final class AcrossModuleUtils
extends Object
    Across context related utility methods for modules.
    Since:
    5.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AcrossContextBeanRegistry acrossContextBeanRegistry(@NonNull AcrossModuleInfo moduleInfo)
      Returns the created AcrossContextBeanRegistry for the context this module belongs to.
      static AcrossListableBeanFactory beanFactory(@NonNull AcrossModuleInfo moduleInfo)
      Returns the AcrossListableBeanFactory attached to a module.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • acrossContextBeanRegistry

        public static AcrossContextBeanRegistry acrossContextBeanRegistry(@NonNull
                                                                  @NonNull AcrossModuleInfo moduleInfo)
        Returns the created AcrossContextBeanRegistry for the context this module belongs to. The module itself does not need to have bootstrapped but the context it is attached to should. null will be returned if no bean registry is available.
        Returns:
        AcrossContextBeanRegistry of the running context (null if none).

      • beanFactory

        @NonNull
public static AcrossListableBeanFactory beanFactory(@NonNull
                                                             @NonNull AcrossModuleInfo moduleInfo)
        Returns the AcrossListableBeanFactory attached to a module. Will throw an IllegalStateException if the module has not bootstrapped and no bean factory is available.
        Parameters:
        moduleInfo - Across module
        Returns:
        beanfactory
